texts: Tube platform announcements telling customers how the service is running will, from April 3, be consistent across the Underground network.
This consistency will provide customers with accurate and clear information about the service if it's disrupted so they will be able to make informed decision on how to continue their journey.

This information will also be displayed on the service update boards in the 
ticket halls.
